definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Regardless of which artificial sweeteners you elect to use, consult with your doctor or dietitian first.
sentences.chinese: 不管您選擇使用人工甘味其中，同你的醫生或營養師。

sentences.english: He whom the thought of love vexes eats and sleeps very little.
sentences.chinese: 沉浸於愛的人，食不甘味，寢不安眠。

definition: bodily fluids (general term in Chinese medicine)
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to benefit the stomach and increase fluids (idiom)
lit. doesn't hurt the spleen or the stomach/fig. something that is not critical
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
condition characterized by thirst, hunger, frequent urination and weight loss, identified in TCM with type 2 diabetes
